SELECT * FROM t_user where customerId = #{customerId} and status = 1 and isDeleted = 0;

SELECT A.*,B.name as departmentName,B.memo as departmentMemo from t_user as A left join t_department as B on A.departmentId = B.id WHERE A.account = #{account} and A.password = #{password} and A.status = 1 and A.isDeleted = 0
SELECT sum(bail) as bail,count(1) as bidCount from t_invest WHERE customerId = #{customerId} and isDeleted = 0;
